subject: Indian Polity
topic: Panchayati Raj aur Nagariya Swashasan (73rd & 74th Amendment)
question_en: What is the significance of the 73rd and 74th Amendments in India's Panchayati Raj System?
question_hi: इस्लामी के ऊर्जाएं के मूल्य इनमें राजनेत्री राजधानी की विविधीय प्रकार में सम्बंधित हैं।

L_en: The amendments to the Panchayati Raj Act strengthen local self-governance by providing autonomy to gram panchayats (ग्रामित सतार)
M_en: The amendments strengthen local self-governance by enhancing the autonomy of village panchayats (मानित कार)
N_en: The amendments promote local self-governance by empowering panchayat samitis (नित सार)
O_en: The amendments enhance local governance by giving autonomy to panchayat samitis (ओर कार)
P_en: The amendments improve local governance by empowering panchayat samitis (पित कार)
Q_en: What is the main objective of the 73rd Amendment Act?

explanation_en: The main objective of the Act is to strengthen panchayat samitis by providing them with greater autonomy (ऊर कार)

question_en: What are the implications of the amendments introduced by the 73rd Amendment Act?
explanation_en: The amendments introduced by the 73rd Amendment Act have implications for decentralized governance in rural areas of Rajasthan.
